function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for misdiagnosis due to inaccuracies in AI and machine learning models","Impact":"Misdiagnosis can lead to inappropriate treatment and further spread of the disease","Mitigation":"Regular validation and refinement of AI and ML models using real-world data, and always involving human oversight in the diagnosis process","Technologies":"AI, machine learning, real-world data validation, human oversight","People":"Healthcare professionals, patients","Owner":"Researchers, healthcare professionals"},{"Description":"Risk of data privacy and security breaches from the use of IoT devices and mobile applications","Impact":"Exposure of sensitive health data and personal information leading to privacy violations and potential misuse","Mitigation":"Implementing robust data encryption, secure access controls, and compliance with data privacy regulations such as GDPR and HIPAA","Technologies":"Data encryption, secure access controls, compliance frameworks","People":"Patients, healthcare professionals, researchers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, developers"},{"Description":"Potential for over-reliance on telemedicine and remote monitoring, leading to missed or delayed physical examinations","Impact":"Missed opportunities for accurate assessment and treatment, and potential worsening of patients' conditions","Mitigation":"Establishing clear protocols for when in-person visits are necessary, providing training on remote monitoring limitations, and ensuring regular physical check-ups for patients","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote monitoring, training programs","People":"Healthcare professionals, patients","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, regulatory bodies"}]}
